title: Healthcare Practical Competency Enhancement: Computational Thinking and STEM Math Projects Based on Activation Principles

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level mathematics foundation and basic problem-solving skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Students complete projects applying algorithmic approaches to solve real-life problems
Students combine mathematical modeling with computational thinking to analyze complex STEM problems and propose solutions
Students systematically document, share, and present project outcomes using collaboration tools in mobile environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
